data.question: What is the precursor ligand used in the synthesis of Gd-IHEP-7?
What transformation does Gd-IHEP-7 undergo upon heating in air?
What is the ammonia production rate of Gd-IHEP-8 for solar-driven nitrogen fixation?
How does the coordination number of Gd3+ change from Gd-IHEP-7 to Gd-IHEP-8?
What is the key factor in the enhanced catalytic efficiency of Gd-IHEP-8 compared to Gd-IHEP-7?
data.answer: Intermediates stabilized by enhanced hydrogen bonding

data.question: What is the role of radical-radical interactions in the stability of Gd-IHEP-7 and Gd-IHEP-8?
data.answer: They impart excellent air and water stability to both RMOFs

data.question: Why does Gd-IHEP-8 exhibit better photocatalytic nitrogen fixation efficiency than Gd-IHEP-7?
data.answer: Due to enhanced separation of photo-generated electron-hole pairs

data.question: What indicates that Gd-IHEP-8 is more sensitive to light irradiation than Gd-IHEP-7?
data.answer: A stable photocurrent density of 0.14 mA cm-2 was rapidly obtained for Gd-IHEP-8

data.question: How do hydrogen bonds between intermediates and O atoms around metal nodes affect photocatalytic nitrogen fixation?
data.answer: They are key in the mechanisms for photocatalytic nitrogen fixation of the two RMOF materials

data.question: What is the effect of the crystal transformation from Gd-IHEP-7 to Gd-IHEP-8 on its framework?
data.answer: It changes from a 2D to 3D framework

data.question: How does the photocatalytic nitrogen fixation efficiency of Gd-IHEP-8 compare to Gd-IHEP-7?
data.answer: Gd-IHEP-8 has a higher ammonia production rate, indicating better efficiency

data.question: What is the significance of the parallel orientation of two bipyC radicals in the RMOFs?
data.answer: It induces both radical-radical and p-p interactions, enhancing the stability of the RMOF structure and radicals

data.question: Is Gd-IHEP-7 stable in air and water?
Does Gd-IHEP-8 have a lower ammonia production rate than Gd-IHEP-7?
Are the photocatalytic NRR pathways of Gd-IHEP-7 and Gd-IHEP-8 significantly different?
Is the enhanced catalytic efficiency of Gd-IHEP-8 attributed to its larger size compared to Gd-IHEP-7?
Does the transformation of Gd-IHEP-7 to Gd-IHEP-8 involve a change in the radical-containing ligand bcbpC3-?
Is the coordination environment rearrangement in Gd-IHEP-8 responsible for its improved photocatalytic activity?
Does the photocatalytic nitrogen fixation performance of Gd-IHEP-7 and Gd-IHEP-8 decrease under ambient temperature and simulated solar light irradiation?
Are Gd-IHEP-7 and Gd-IHEP-8 both synthesized using a one-pot method?
